quest.name: Doman Connection
journal: Ilberd is eager to resume the pursuit of Eline Roaille.

* This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Ilberd in Gridania.

※The Main Scenario Guide shows the next available quest. You can toggle it on and off in Character Configuration, under UI Settings.

After joining Ilberd at Sweetbloom Pier, the two of you are met by Yugiri, who informs you that Eline Roaille is headed in the direction of the Hawthorne Hut. However, your reunion with the Garlean spy must wait, for another matter requires your immediate attention. An imperial squadron has set forth from Castrum Oriens on a mission to destroy an Alliance communications-jamming device in the South Shroud. If they succeed, Eline Roaille may well abort her secret rendezvous, thus depriving you of the chance to secure damning evidence of her treachery. Make haste to the South Shroud, and seek out the shinobi at Quarrymill who will brief you on the situation.
The shinobi informs you that the advancing imperial squadron is presently near Amdapor Keep. Intercept the Garleans, and destroy their magitek weapons.
You have destroyed all the death claws. Report your success to the shinobi who awaits nearby.

With the imperial squadron defeated, the jamming device is now safe. As such, Eline Roaille will have no choice but to communicate with her accomplices in person. All that remains is to catch her in the act.

dialogue.name: ILBERD
dialogue.text: Our hunt leads us to the East Shroud, Scion. I suggest we follow Roaille's example and take the ferry from Westshore Pier.

dialogue.name: ILBERD
dialogue.text: You'll doubtless wish to make certain preparations. See to them while I go on ahead. I shall wait for you at Sweetbloom Pier.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: This way, my friends.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Your quarry makes for the Hawthorne Hut.

dialogue.name: ILBERD
dialogue.text: Very good. We must make haste─

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: A moment, Captain.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: There is another matter which requires your attention─and most urgently, I fear.

dialogue.name: ILBERD
dialogue.text: What is it?

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: A short while ago, an imperial squadron was observed departing Castrum Oriens. They march at speed for the South Shroud.

dialogue.name: ILBERD
dialogue.text: So they have decided to take action...

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Indeed. They seek to destroy the jamming device.

dialogue.name: ILBERD
dialogue.text: An explanation is in order. You may be aware that the Garleans have their own method of communicating over great distances.

dialogue.name: ILBERD
dialogue.text: Well, our ingenious friends at Garlond Ironworks have provided us with devices which disrupt these communications, and we have installed them around the city–states. In so doing, we have made it difficult for imperial agents to correspond with their masters.

dialogue.name: ILBERD
dialogue.text: Of course, we did not expect the Garleans to remain silent. If they wished to communicate, they would find a way, be it via covert correspondence or secret meetings.

dialogue.name: ILBERD
dialogue.text: Needless to say, we hoped they would risk the latter. And Roaille has not disappointed us.

dialogue.name: ILBERD
dialogue.text: As a well-known face in the Immortal Flames, she cannot move about Thanalan without being recognized. It would only be a matter of time before someone saw through her disguise.

dialogue.name: ILBERD
dialogue.text: 'Tis for this reason, I believe, that she has chosen the Black Shroud for her clandestine meeting. This place is home to many of your kindThe Elezen are a common sight here, and the arrival of one more Elezen isher comings and goings are not like to turn any heads.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: However, were the jamming device to be rendered inoperative, Roaille would no longer need to meet her masters in person, and their planned rendezvous would almost certainly be called off.

dialogue.name: ILBERD
dialogue.text: ...And we cannot have that. It would deprive us of the opportunity to secure damning evidence against her─which is the very least we need if we're to convict someone of her standing.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: All rests upon the continued operation of the jamming device. It must needs be protected. If you could attend to this task, my shinobi and I will continue to observe Roaille.

dialogue.name: ILBERD
dialogue.text: Very well. Scion─I would have you intercept the Garleans while my men move to cut off their retreat. None must escape.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Several of my countrymen have already taken up positions in the South Shroud. Seek out the shinobi at Quarrymill, and he will apprise you of the situation.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Pray seek out the shinobi at Quarrymill. He will apprise you of the situation.

dialogue.name: ILBERD
dialogue.text: Make haste and find those Garleans. I will send my men to cut off their retreat.

dialogue.name: SHINOBI00080
dialogue.text: We meet again, my friend. I have no Mun–Tuy tonic to offer this time, I'm afraid.

dialogue.name: SHINOBI00080
dialogue.text: As I believe you know, imperial forces are in the South Shroud on a mission to destroy the jamming device. We must see to it that they do not succeed.

dialogue.name: SHINOBI00080
dialogue.text: ...So the Crystal Braves will cut off their retreat? Very well.

dialogue.name: SHINOBI00080
dialogue.text: My countrymen and I shall attend to the soldiers. Their infernal machines, we leave in your capable hands.

dialogue.name: SHINOBI00080
dialogue.text: At present, the Garleans are in the vicinity of Amdapor Keep. Let us head there at once.

dialogue.name: SHINOBI00080
dialogue.text: The Garleans are in the vicinity of Amdapor Keep. Let us head there at once.

dialogue.name: SHINOBI00080
dialogue.text: That was a most impressive showing, my friend.

dialogue.name: SHINOBI00080
dialogue.text: As you can see, we too have not been idle. The Ivy will receive no warning of our coming.
